verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> by<WG1223> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> Timothy<WG5095> our brother,<WG80> unto the<WG3588> church<WG1577> of God<WG2316> which is<WG5607> at<WG1722> Corinth,<WG2882> with<WG4862> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> saints<WG40> which are<WG5607> in<WG1722> all<WG3650> Achaia: <WG882>
Grace <WG5485> be to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> from<WG575> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> from the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

Blessed <WG2128> be God,<WG2316> even<WG2532> the Father<WG3962> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> of mercies,<WG3628> and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of all<WG3956> comfort;<WG3874>

Who <WG3588> comforteth<WG3870> us<WG2248> in<WG1909> all<WG3956> our<WG2257> tribulation,<WG2347> that we<WG2248> may be able<WG1410> to comfort<WG3870> them<WG3588> which are in<WG1722> any<WG3956> trouble,<WG2347> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> comfort<WG3874> wherewith<WG3739> we<WG848> ourselves are comforted<WG3870> of<WG5259> God.<WG2316>

For <WG3754> as<WG2531> the<WG3588> sufferings<WG3804> of Christ<WG5547> abound<WG4052> in<WG1519> us,<WG2248> so<WG3779> our<WG2257> consolation<WG3874> also<WG2532> aboundeth<WG4052> by<WG1223> Christ.<WG5547>

And <WG1161> whether<WG1535> we be afflicted,<WG2346> it is for<WG5228> your<WG5216> consolation<WG3874> and<WG2532> salvation,<WG4991> which is effectual<WG1754> in<WG1722> the enduring<WG5281> of the<WG3588> same<WG846> sufferings<WG3804> which<WG3739> we<WG2249> also<WG2532> suffer:<WG3958> or whether<WG1535> we be comforted,<WG3870> it is for<WG5228> your<WG5216> consolation<WG3874> and<WG2532> salvation.<WG4991>

And <WG2532> our<WG2257> hope<WG1680> of<WG5228> you<WG5216> is steadfast,<WG949> knowing,<WG1492> that<WG3754> as<WG5618> ye are<WG2075> partakers<WG2844> of the<WG3588> sufferings,<WG3804> so<WG3779> shall ye be also<WG2532> of the<WG3588> consolation.<WG3874>

For <WG1063> we would<WG2309> not,<WG3756> brethren,<WG80> have you ignorant<WG50> <WG5209> of<WG5228> our<WG2257> trouble<WG2347> which came<WG1096> to us<WG2254> in<WG1722> Asia,<WG773> that<WG3754> we were pressed<WG916> out of measure,<WG2596> <WG5236> above<WG5228> strength,<WG1411> insomuch that<WG5620> we<WG2248> despaired<WG1820> even<WG2532> of life: <WG2198>

But <WG235> we<WG848> had<WG2192> the<WG3588> sentence<WG610> of death<WG2288> in<WG1722> ourselves,<WG1438> that<WG2443> we should<WG5600> not<WG3361> trust<WG3982> in<WG1909> ourselves,<WG1438> but<WG235> in<WG1909> God<WG2316> which raiseth<WG1453> the<WG3588> dead: <WG3498>

Who <WG3739> delivered<WG4506> us<WG2248> from<WG1537> so great<WG5082> a death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> doth deliver:<WG4506> in<WG1519> whom<WG3739> we trust<WG1679> that<WG3754> he will<WG2532> yet<WG2089> deliver<WG4506> us;

Ye <WG5216> also<WG2532> helping together<WG4943> by prayer<WG1162> for<WG5228> us,<WG2257> that<WG2443> for the gift<WG5486> bestowed upon<WG1519> us<WG2248> by the means of<WG1537> many<WG4183> persons<WG4383> thanks may be given<WG2168> by<WG1223> many<WG4183> on our behalf.<WG5228> <WG2257>

For <WG1063> our<WG2257> rejoicing<WG2746> is<WG2076> this,<WG3778> the<WG3588> testimony<WG3142> of our<WG2257> conscience,<WG4893> that<WG3754> in<WG1722> simplicity<WG572> and<WG2532> godly<WG2316> sincerity,<WG1505> not<WG3756> with<WG1722> fleshly<WG4559> wisdom,<WG4678> but<WG235> by<WG1722> the grace<WG5485> of God,<WG2316> we have had our conversation<WG390> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> world,<WG2889> and<WG1161> more abundantly<WG4056> to<WG4314> you-ward.<WG5209>

For <WG1063> we write<WG1125> none<WG3756> other things<WG243> unto you,<WG5213> than<WG235> <WG2228> what<WG3739> ye read<WG314> or<WG2228> <WG2532> acknowledge;<WG1921> and<WG1161> I trust<WG1679> ye shall<WG3754> acknowledge<WG1921> even<WG2532> to<WG2193> the end;<WG5056>

As <WG2531> also<WG2532> ye have acknowledged<WG1921> us<WG2248> in<WG575> part,<WG3313> that<WG3754> we are<WG2070> your<WG5216> rejoicing,<WG2745> even as<WG2509> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> are ours<WG2257> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> day<WG2250> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus.<WG2424>
And <WG2532> in this<WG5026> confidence<WG4006> I was minded<WG1014> to come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> before,<WG4386> that<WG2443> ye might have<WG2192> a second<WG1208> benefit;<WG5485>

And <WG2532> to pass<WG1330> by<WG1223> you<WG5216> into<WG1519> Macedonia,<WG3109> and<WG2532> to come<WG2064> again<WG3825> out of<WG575> Macedonia<WG3109> unto<WG4314> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> of<WG5259> you<WG5216> to be brought on my way<WG4311> toward<WG1519> Judea.<WG2449>

When I therefore<WG3767> was thus minded,<WG1011> <WG5124> did I<WG3385> <WG686> use<WG5530> lightness?<WG1644> or<WG2228> the things that<WG3739> I purpose,<WG1011> do I purpose<WG1011> according<WG2596> to the flesh,<WG4561> that<WG2443> with<WG3844> me<WG1698> there should be<WG5600> yea<WG3483> yea,<WG3483> and<WG2532> nay<WG3756> nay?<WG3756>
But <WG1161> as God<WG2316> is true,<WG4103> <WG3754> our<WG2257> word<WG3056> toward<WG4314> you<WG5209> was<WG1096> not<WG3756> yea and nay.<WG3483> <WG2532> <WG3756>

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> who was preached<WG2784> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> by<WG1223> us,<WG2257> even by<WG1223> me<WG1700> and<WG2532> Silvanus<WG4610> and<WG2532> Timothy,<WG5095> was<WG1096> not<WG3756> yea and nay,<WG3483> <WG2532> <WG3756> but<WG235> in<WG1722> him<WG846> was<WG1096> yea.<WG3483>

For <WG1063> all<WG3745> the promises<WG1860> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> him<WG846> are<WG3588> yea,<WG3483> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> him<WG846> <WG3588> Amen,<WG281> unto<WG4314> the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> by<WG1223> us.<WG2257>
Now <WG1161> he which establisheth<WG950> us<WG2248> with<WG4862> you<WG5213> in<WG1519> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> hath anointed<WG5548> us,<WG2248> is God;<WG2316>
Who hath also sealed<WG4972> <WG2532> us,<WG2248> and<WG2532> given<WG1325> the<WG3588> earnest<WG728> of the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> hearts.<WG2588>

Moreover <WG1161> I<WG1473> call<WG1941> God<WG2316> for a record<WG3144> upon<WG1909> my<WG1699> soul,<WG5590> that<WG3754> to spare<WG5339> you<WG5216> I came<WG2064> not as yet<WG3765> unto<WG1519> Corinth.<WG2882>

Not <WG3756> for that<WG3754> we have dominion over<WG2961> your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> but<WG235> are<WG2070> helpers<WG4904> of your<WG5216> joy:<WG5479> for<WG1063> by faith<WG4102> ye stand.<WG2476>
